_Serilog: Configurations for the Serilog logging framework.
_PostgreSqlOptions: Configurations for connecting to the PostgreSQL database.

PostgreSqlOptions._Host: The hostname or IP address of the PostgreSQL server.
PostgreSqlOptions._Username: The username for authentication with the PostgreSQL server.
PostgreSqlOptions._Password: The password for authentication with the PostgreSQL server.
PostgreSqlOptions._Port: The port number on which the PostgreSQL server is listening (default: 5432).
PostgreSqlOptions._Database: The name of the PostgreSQL database to connect to.

StartupOptions._EnableSwagger: Boolean indicating whether Swagger documentation is enabled (default: true).
StartupOptions._AllowCors: Boolean indicating whether Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) is allowed (default: true).

_StorageOptions: Configurations for managing file storage behavior related to user images and accommodations.

StorageOptions._StorageFolderPath: Path where all user and accommodation-related images are stored. This should be a valid folder path on the server.
StorageOptions._DefaultUserImagePath: Path to the default image used for users who do not have a profile picture. This is used when the user hasn't uploaded their own image.
StorageOptions._DefaultAccommodationCoverImagePath: Path to the default image used for accommodations that do not have a main image uploaded by the owner.
